title: Pancakes
description: Fluffy and delicious gluten-free pancakes made with simple ingredients.
steps: Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat.
Grease the skillet lightly with butter or oil.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface and edges look set, about 2 minutes.
Flip the pancake carefully and cook for another 1-2 minutes until golden brown.
Repeat with the remaining batter.
Serve warm with your favorite toppings like syrup, fruits, or butter.

title: Grilled Chicken
description: Juicy and delicious grilled chicken seasoned to perfection.
steps: Clean the chicken and pat it dry with a paper towel.
In a bowl, prepare the marinade by mixing the spices, oil, and lemon juice.
Rub the marinade thoroughly over the chicken, ensuring even coating.
Cover the chicken and let it marinate in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour (or overnight for better flavor).
Preheat the grill to medium heat.
Brush the grill grates with oil to prevent sticking.
Place the chicken on the grill and cook for 6-8 minutes on each side, depending on the thickness of the pieces.
Use a meat thermometer to ensure the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C).
Remove the chicken from the grill and let it rest for 5 minutes before serving.
Serve warm with your favorite sides like roasted vegetables or salad.

title: Chocolate Cake
description: A moist and decadent chocolate cake perfect for any occasion.
steps: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan with butter or line it with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, sift together the flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, and sugar.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, melted butter, milk, and vanilla extract until well combined.
Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, mixing until a smooth batter forms.
Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan, spreading it evenly.
Place the pan in the preheated oven and bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Remove the cake from the oven and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes.
Transfer the cake to a wire rack to cool completely before serving.
Optional: Frost with chocolate ganache or dust with powdered sugar before serving.

steps: Start with laying the Spinach wrap

steps: Marinate chicken

title: Caesar Salad
description: Crispy romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing.
steps: Prepare dressing
Toss lettuce with dressing

title: Gluten-Free Pancakes
steps: Mix all ingredients together.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet.
Cook until bubbles form and flip the pancake.
Cook until golden brown on the other side.
Serve warm with syrup or toppings.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Crispy skin-on salmon fillets with a tangy and smoky glaze.
steps: Season salmon
Grill until crispy
Add glaze

title: Avocado Toast
description: Creamy avocado spread on toasted bread, topped with optional eggs for a wholesome start to your day.
steps: Mash avocado
Toast bread
Spread avocado
Add toppings

title: Spaghetti
description: A timeless pasta dish featuring a hearty and flavorful meat sauce.
steps: Cook beef and onions
Add tomato puree
Boil spaghetti
Combine and serve

title: Mojito
description: A refreshing Cuban cocktail made with fresh mint, lime, and rum.
steps: Muddle fresh mint leaves and sugar in a glass to release the mint's aroma.
Cut a lime into wedges and squeeze the juice into the glass, then drop the wedges in.
Fill the glass halfway with ice cubes.
Pour white rum over the ice.
Top off with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a sprig of mint and a lime wedge.
Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing Mojito!

title: Passion Fruit Martini
description: A tropical and tangy martini made with fresh passion fruit, vodka, and a hint of vanilla.
steps: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add vodka, passion fruit puree, vanilla syrup, lime juice, and passion fruit liqueur.
Shake well for about 15-20 seconds until well chilled.
Strain the mixture into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with half a passion fruit on top.
Optionally, serve with a shot of prosecco on the side.
Enjoy your tropical Passion Fruit Martini!

title: Piña Colada
description: A creamy and tropical cocktail made with pineapple, coconut, and rum.
steps: Fill a blender with ice cubes.
Add white rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a chilled hurricane or highball glass.
Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a maraschino cherry.
Serve immediately with a straw and enjoy your tropical Piña Colada!

title: Strawberry Virgin Cocktail
description: A refreshing and fruity non-alcoholic cocktail made with fresh strawberries and citrus flavors.
steps: Blend fresh strawberries, lemon juice, and honey (or sugar syrup) until smooth.
Strain the mixture to remove any pulp (optional).
Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Pour the strawberry mixture over the ice.
Top with sparkling water and stir gently.
Garnish with a strawberry slice and mint leaves.
Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing Strawberry Virgin Cocktail!

title: One-Pot Garlic Shrimp & Broccoli
description: A quick and flavorful gluten-free dish featuring tender shrimp and broccoli cooked in a garlicky sauce.
steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add shrimp and cook until they turn pink, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Toss in the broccoli florets and cook for another 3-4 minutes until tender-crisp.
Season with salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes (if using).
Drizzle with fresh lemon juice before serving.
Serve warm and enjoy your gluten-free Garlic Shrimp & Broccoli!

title: Blueberry Mojito
description: A fruity twist on the classic Mojito, made with fresh blueberries, mint, and lime.
steps: Muddle fresh blueberries, mint leaves, and sugar in a glass to release the flavors.
Cut a lime into wedges and squeeze the juice into the glass, then drop the wedges in.
Fill the glass halfway with ice cubes.
Pour white rum over the ice.
Top off with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a sprig of mint and a few whole blueberries.
Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing Blueberry Mojito!

title: Strawberry Daiquiri Mocktail
description: A refreshing and fruity non-alcoholic version of the classic Strawberry Daiquiri, made with fresh strawberries and lime juice.
steps: Blend fresh strawberries, lime juice, and honey (or sugar syrup) until smooth.
Add ice cubes and blend again until slushy.
Pour into a chilled cocktail glass.
Top with a splash of sparkling water for extra fizz (optional).
Garnish with a strawberry slice and a lime wedge.
Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing Strawberry Daiquiri Mocktail!
